div.p: Senior Spotlight: Meaghan Dahna view image

Have you been craving something sweet? The first 50 families to pick up lunches on Monday, April 27th will be "treated" to a Brownie Project! If you have any questions about completing the lab, let me know. view image
Senior Spotlight: Madison Ballesteros view image

Congratulations to Emma Kral on advancing to State! The National History Day competition has switched to a virtual platform for District champions to continue to the next level. She is currently making adjustments to her project before it is judged again on May 4th. view image
